prompt:
Use case: ui-mockup
Primary request: A modern personal finance tracker app hero image showing a smartphone with clean income and expense charts, subtle transaction cards, and a calm trustworthy aesthetic
Scene/background: minimal desktop surface with soft abstract financial shapes in background
Subject: smartphone displaying a polished expense and income dashboard
Style/medium: premium product-style UI mockup
Composition/framing: wide 3:2 composition with generous negative space on the right for headline
Lighting/mood: soft daylight with gentle shadows
Color palette: teal, slate, and warm neutral accents
Constraints: no logos, no text, no watermark
Avoid: cluttered layout, oversaturated colors, exaggerated 3D effects
